website_summaries.verdict: This relatively affordable massage chair truly shines when you test its zero gravity position, where all pressure is taken off your back, legs, and shoulders for the ultimate in relaxation.
pros: Airbags replicate a massage by a professional masseuse
Available in Charcoal and Chocolate colors
cons: A backlit remote would be nice for low-light rooms

customer_reviews.title: nice & quiet
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the wife she loves it. I myself can do without it. but as long as she's Happy, I'm HAPPY!! So this has so far been a great buy. I did not get the white glove delivery. save the $300.00 if you live in a one story house. The setup is easy. but you will need two people to move this beast of a chair. and too install the bar at the foot of chair. overall for the price of this kind of chair If it holds up a couple of years it will be a FANTATIC BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Mems

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve waited a week plus to write a review of this chair. Yes, the foot pressure is intense - almost too intense. The good news? You can turn the foot massage part off while the rest of the body gets treatment. That’s what I do. I love the auto function #4 where it stretches you. This chair is the real deal. It has GREAT power to give you that deep massage you are needing. My bride LOVES this chair. Highly recommend for price, comfort, aesthetics and overall value.
customer_reviews.author: MHayslip

customer_reviews.title: This chair is amazing. It isn't too plush so you can actually ...
customer_reviews.text: This chair is amazing. It isn't too plush so you can actually feel your massage. It's pretty intense, espcially in the arms and feet. Overall, I love this chair. Side note: don't over use it, you'll bruise yourself up! LOL.
customer_reviews.author: jaa.1385

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the features and the price.
customer_reviews.text: While the instruction booklet is a bit of a challenge, it becomes clear with practice. The number of functions and combinations is remarkable considering the price. I've had it more than 6 weeks and use it at least twice a day. The heat function is a bit intense as is the high setting on the compression feature, but it has 3 settings so there is one to suit everyone. The stretch feature was new to me but I quite like it. It is rather large for a chair and makes quite a statement in a living room. If you are house proud you may want to place it in a bedroom or other location. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: arctic poppy

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good massage chair for the price. And reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this massage chair for over 3 years without any problems. The price for this chair is more than half of comparable models. The quality of the chair is excellent, and stays in good shape if it’s used with a cover. The leather has not deteriorated at all, which is surprising. The mechanicals are also quiet. The only complaint I have would be that this chair is not made for small physiques, less than 5’ tall people. In particular, the arm compression massagers just don’t reach the arms fully of smaller physique people.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck out there.
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of the best investments I’ve made. The chair will literally message the days stress away. Everything has worked great without any issues, although it’s only been a few weeks. If you are on the taller side (I’m 6’2”), there are certain positions that will not work including the zero gravity position. I’m still able to get really comfortable. Be prepared that it takes a few sessions to know what works best for you. All in all, great chair at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: J Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair.
customer_reviews.text: I use this chair every day and LOVE it. My only regret is that I didn't order it earlier. It came fully assembled with the exception of 2 bolts on the footrest, and that was easy to complete. I can't recommend this enough. I have had it for 4 months now with no problems and just ordered one for my uncle because he liked it so well. I highly recommend this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Massage Chair
customer_reviews.text: I waited three weeks to write this review, so I could really put the RELAXONCHAIR [MK-II Plus] through its paces. It did not disappoint after about one hundred uses by three adults. I found it very comparable to massage chairs costing several thousand dollars more. The quality and construction are sound. It was relativity easy to get up two sets of steps into our living room with my son via working in unison and grabbing the sides correctly. It is quite and responsive and even made a believer out of my initially pessimistic wife who now loves it and thinks it was an excellent purchase too. In summary, it was an excellent quality of life (therapeutic) purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Hubby's Best Bday Gift
customer_reviews.text: The husband loved this gift. We saw one of these in a furniture store but the price was way too high for the features he wanted the most. He likes the shoulder message and lower back option. We wished the time was longer than 30 minute intervals but it was still worth the price. It would have been if the the delivery included haul away of the pallet. It would also been nice if instructions were included.
customer_reviews.author: ShellyW0rld

customer_reviews.title: As good as chairs that cost twice as much!
customer_reviews.text: I have a $3500 massage chair. This one is almost as good. I especially enjoy pausing the rollers exactly where they feel the best and letting them stay there until I can no longer stand it. Good times! Really, this is a fine chair, a superb value and looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Rick B.

customer_reviews.title: The product was pretty good, the massage was strong and nice
customer_reviews.text: I liked the chair a lot, my only complaint was the remote was very loud. I am having to return it because there was a defect with the roller (making noises), but the company was very helpful and encouraged me to do so within my return window and reorder even. Since they claim to have a low defect rate. I will probably even take my chances and order it again, because I really loved the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Ha C.

customer_reviews.title: This chair lives up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: It is everything I needed. I had researched and saved, before purchasing. It’s a great product at a reasonable price point. As many say, the foot rollers can be intense if you have sensitive feet, but adding towels/padding fixed that tiny issue for us sensitive folks. The chair was delivered as promised and came exactly when promised. It’s heavy to lift, but set up was very simple. I think I have sold a few to my friends. It’s a popular item at my house. I would highly recommend this massage chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pain relief!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is amazing!!! I sit in it just about every morning and evening soothes pain from back and legs! Pre programmed modes easy to use, materials nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As good as $5000 chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Huge fan. I just tried two $5000 chairs and this one is just as good. I bought this based on reviews so trust me. The rollers cover everywhere and the way it compresses your arms and feet are awesome. Highly recommend and I normally buy the most expensive things listed. Not this time and I’m very happy.
customer_reviews.author: lisa w.

customer_reviews.title: The control unit and brochure
customer_reviews.text: The brochure is hard to see and follow. The print is too small and the arrows pointing to the buttons are difficult to follow as the black and white diagram is too busy and not easy to follow. The control unit itself has buttons that are not easy to use without referring to the guide brochure.
customer_reviews.author: HAMID HASHEMI

customer_reviews.title: the body scan function does not work
customer_reviews.text: the body scan function does not work at all. The position of the roller does not fit the body.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Chen

customer_reviews.title: This message chair has been working great since we purchased it a couple weeks ago
customer_reviews.text: This message chair has been working great since we purchased it a couple weeks ago. Easy to attach the foot piece and operate. It has rollers so you can tilt and roll which is helpful because the chair is heavy. The 4 auto programs give a good variety of muscle work and stretching. The manual programs offer enough adjustment to tailor focus and needs as well. For the price we found it to be great for us so far and would recommend it without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: G. Bourg

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! Very heavy to carry into a home with a lot of stairs. Only advice I’d offer to company is that the buttons should light up so you can see them.
customer_reviews.author: Lolakitty

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away
customer_reviews.text: Worst purchase on amazon ever. Big fail on every front save your money look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Service was outstanding when I called to see if the pin was placed correctly. Because we had thought the leg recliner was not working.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Zhang

customer_reviews.title: This is the best product I have ever bought in my life
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I have ever bought in my life. The wife and I went to try some massage chairs for $5000 at a local shop and this one was comparable with all of it's features. I use this machine daily and I feel great after every use. The only thing that I don't like about the machine is how strong the foot massage is.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Young and Anri Young

customer_reviews.title: -) but that's a good thing.
customer_reviews.text: everyone in the house loves it...actually, i never get in it because someone else is using it. :-) but that's a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Johnd

customer_reviews.title: Best chair for the money
customer_reviews.text: The chair was delivered on time and in excellent condition. There was a 2 minute assembly of the leg section that was very easy. We simply plugged in the cord, hit the power switch, and the chair came to life and has functioned perfectly. It is by far the most awesome experience as far as massage chairs go. After looking around at several models - most of them twice the cost of this chair -we settled on this one through Amazon. Couldn't be more satisfied. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Langman

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I use it almost every night I can, I love all the settings on it. It's has very strong air bags on it through out, the L track is heavenly. I'm glad I finally bought it for sure :)
customer_reviews.author: Carlos R.

customer_reviews.title: So relaxing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my chair. I drive a pilot car for 12 hours a day...when I get home it's so nice to recline back and get a massage! Awe relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Walter

customer_reviews.title: the chair didn't last 30 days before it quit working
customer_reviews.text: The chair did not even run for longer than 30 days before it stopped working can't eat just one week before
customer_reviews.author: Jill S. Ulrich

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Get one of those two man forklifts if moving it up and down stairs. It came on a pallet, and we use it all the time, bought the extended warranty and love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Wilde

customer_reviews.title: Great massage chair!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product works well without any issues,up to now it still works.my wife love it and also the rest of the family!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Best Choice

customer_reviews.title: Pure pleasure
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair, researched many brands before selecting this model. Every program is exactly as described. Our contractor was here and helped moved the chair where we wanted it and was the first to use it. The look on his face changed to a look of pure pleasure as the massage progressed. Me and my husband use it everyday. A great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: chris w

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair
customer_reviews.text: Awesome massage chair. Deep and full massage. Everybody in the house loves this chair. This chair is a super value compared to much higher priced chair. Basically you get same quality of massage. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ae soon choi

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: I love the chair and at this price I appreciate what it has to offer. I am disappointed that a button on the remote does not work where you can pause the massage on a certain body part. I guess mine is defective. Other than that I love it, and if they fix my remote I would give a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: CFF

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair a month ago for my mother-in-law but didn’t try it until today. One word: AMAZING! It’s ways better than brand-named chairs that are three or more times more expensive. I’m buying one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: TrueOrFalse

customer_reviews.title: Great massage chair!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband as a birthday/father’s day gift. He loved it (and so do I)! Some of the pre-programmed massages can be a bit intense. Thankfully, there are manual options that target only the areas you want. It’s also comfortable as just a recliner if you don’t want a massage.
customer_reviews.author: Greganato

customer_reviews.title: It's been a year now and I use this chair ...
customer_reviews.text: It's been a year now and I use this chair daily sometimes 2 or 3 times a day. IT PERFORMS FLAWLESSLY!!!
customer_reviews.author: shane t.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: We are so far more than satisfied with the operation and quality of this chair. It gives a fantastic massage. I wish the controller was lit for use in low light.
customer_reviews.author: STANLEY ROSENBERG

customer_reviews.title: Best value for massage chairs out there
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my father, replacing a 20 year old Panasonic chair. Being used several times everyday. Best value for massage chairs out there.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Average massage chair
customer_reviews.text: Online reviews have this chair ranked pretty high but I disagree. Chair is very narrow and lacks some features that the others chairs have.
customer_reviews.author: Jhonana

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have had the chair a little over a month, and use it almost every day. The buttons to get to the massage you want are confusing at first, I spent hours trying to memorize what does what. Once you get that down, you can settle in and the chair does the rest. I would recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Loftiss

customer_reviews.title: We love this chair
customer_reviews.text: We love this chair. We brought it for our son who has cerebral palsy and he uses it as a lounge chair as well while he plays his nintendo games. He broke the arm of the last recliner he had, this chair is also sturdy and we purchased the additional three year warrnanty. The rest of the family likes using it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas McNeill

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Just receied it. Assembly is really easy - just insert one screw, thats it. Very comfortable. Have not tried the heating function but all other functions are really nice. Whole family uses it. So far we love it and customer service was great.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Tetzner

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved it!! He has a lot of back problems and this was well worth the money. I also loved it because the chair was already put together. It made a great Father's Day gift.
customer_reviews.author: Wingit

customer_reviews.title: So relaxing at the end of the day! A ...
customer_reviews.text: So relaxing at the end of the day! A little difficult for me since I'm not as tall as my husband and the roller doesn't stop its scan at my neck. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Loven it!!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little apprehensive due to not knowing the company, nor having a brick and mortar store. That being said, WE LOVE IT. Been using it for only one day, but very haapy with what is does.
customer_reviews.author: Pentjak Karate

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I have noticed a small improvement in mobility ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have noticed a small improvement in mobility since using this. I have arthritis and fibromialgia.
customer_reviews.author: Annette O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent massage chair
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this massage chair as a gift for my sister. She loves everything about the chair. I researched several chairs before I purchased this particular one. I am very happy with my purchase...great deal for the money. One of the best decisions that I've ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Osborne

customer_reviews.title: ... couple chairs for our reps at work and they love it. This chair is very relaxing
customer_reviews.text: We got a couple chairs for our reps at work and they love it. This chair is very relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M.

customer_reviews.title: Like to would like to have a peaceful rest after a cycle but not this chair.
customer_reviews.text: The thing I dislike most is the on and off button on the control panel would not turn it off when the cycle is over, the roller will be going forever behind the head and neck unless I get out of the chair and turn it off behind the chair which is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: xiang

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: It hurts the shoulders. Does not accommodate the width of your shoulders. The airbags just fill to the brink and squeeze til you puke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gives relief to the body as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This chair is awesome. It works great, give a wonderful massage. Has many options to relieve what ever part of the body needs relief. I highly recommend it. Wish I would have purchased one years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This incredible chair!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I purchased this chair!! After 3 sessions in this chair, I can walk without pain!! My feet had so much tension in them, that the muscles were all contracted together. Making my gate off!! Now, I walk pain free, in a steady, upright position!!
customer_reviews.author: julie hanna-jefferies

customer_reviews.title: Great for post op surgery aches and pains!
customer_reviews.text: Don't dislike anything about the chair. Wish I had more time just to sit in it...my daughter who is a Physical Therapist loves my chair...👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Piper

customer_reviews.title: Relaxon chair
customer_reviews.text: Remote control can't be read in the dark. Should be backlit. Should also be more easily programable to treat specific body areas. Otherwise, I love the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Ed B

customer_reviews.title: great chair, my wife loves it and uses it ...
customer_reviews.text: delivery was fast, great chair, my wife loves it and uses it every day, still trying all the settings.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Winn

customer_reviews.title: I love it so far
customer_reviews.text: I love it so far! I've just had it one day but was in it for more than 2 hours the moment I plugged it in. I'm happy I purchased it :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely luv this chair!! Sit in it everyday after work. Family comes by and uses it to!
customer_reviews.author: BlessedMama

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Good for 6 foot and under person. Not a great sitting chair but does do a good job massaging for which it is intended.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila S

customer_reviews.title: this is an awesome chair.
customer_reviews.text: If you get past the price...this is an awesome chair.
customer_reviews.author: robert santoro

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and personalize your own routine
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing we don't like about our chair, we're sleeping better and it's so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: gonejeeping

customer_reviews.title: The chair works great! Never complain. She likes it very much 👍
customer_reviews.text: My mom is very happy with the chair, since the day she had it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Company Info?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from Amazon in Jan. 2016. I need to troubleshoot a problem that just surfaced with this chair (RC-MKII) and there is no method of contact listed in the user handbook. Anyone know how to get in touch w/company? (Made in China) When the chair is not in use, the 10 minute timer starts beeping and I can only unplug it to stop the beeping. The remote will not stop it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Feeling Better
customer_reviews.text: This chair is temporary relief from aches & pain after work,exercise and play. Program or manual there is a function that works
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: This chair is amazing! My husband won't stop raving about it
customer_reviews.text: This chair is amazing! My husband won't stop raving about it...We only received it last week and his back pain has already subsided (in combo with an inverter chair). The price of this chair is more than reasonable for what you get. A Smart chair indeed!
customer_reviews.author: DONNA

customer_reviews.title: To get a new controler
customer_reviews.text: The remote controller can not be used,please inform me,how to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: zhanjiang

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is awesome. The price is not bad at all. We saw something almost identical in the stores for more than double this price. It does everything: scans your body,masage your feet, your neck, tailbone... It didn't turn on right away for us. We thought that it could be our plug. It wasn't. We had to take the diode out from the back of the chair, this tiny little piece.. we put it back and it started working. The chair comes already put together,you just have to plug it. We love it...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: It is amazingly great. My wife and I both enjoyed it the first on on it. The installation is so easy. Se will sure enjoy it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Zaihua Ji

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, very powerful, adjustable, Size Matters
customer_reviews.text: This is an expensive chair.but: 1) it's very powerful.. I push back hard.. and it takes it without groan. The bottom of your feet is VERY Powerful.. I need to wear slippers. All you can handle. you can feel your blood circulate on auto.. first time had a very mild headache but not since.. likely a good thing!! 2) I'm a kinda big guy.. 6'1".. 230 LBs.. the neck squeeze doesn't quite fit me, and the shoulder squeeze I have to scrunch into. Might dig in and modify. I don't have a lot of miles on it yet.. but the first 30 massages have been decent. very satisfied so far
customer_reviews.author: MarkH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Other than not being used to a foot massage the chair is doing exactly what they advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be well made,
customer_reviews.text: It is everything I wanted it to be,very relaxing "like the name says".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best thing ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My brother is fighting Cancer and I bought this for him it helps him so much!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Jaykins

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair !
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. You can't beat the options it offers for less than the more expensive ones. I have serious back problems and pain all day every day. This chair gives me the deep tissue massage I need to relieve cramped muscles. It is too big for getting through regular bedroom doorways in older homes but my husband took the door and frame off so we could easily move it into a back bedroom for a quiet little spa-l getaway. I've noticed it isn't on Amazon anymore but if it ever becomes available again, I will purchase one for my parents.
customer_reviews.author: JennE

customer_reviews.title: great chair for the money
customer_reviews.text: So far, great chair for the money. It was an investment for my health.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: This chair is awesome, it is everything I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: This chair is awesome, it is everything I was hoping for. Delivery was timely. I would recommend this chair to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri G

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: My grandma loved this so much her sister bought one.
customer_reviews.author: Bathy Constant

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it everything perfect from delivery to how it works
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this chair for one week and it definitely met my expectations and more, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C. Dearman

customer_reviews.title: Very low intensity
customer_reviews.text: This massager hits the right places, but does not have enough pressure to penetrate muscles for a real massage. Honestly I’m disappointed and wouldn’t recommend it unless you are ok with a very and I mean very light massage.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair and Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: I shopped for several weeks reading reviews and studying different chairs and options. I finally settled on this one and last night was my first night using it. I really like it. It is not the greatest around the neck or the feet, but it is good. For the back (where I have issues) it is absolutely fantastic. I am 5'9" and around 225lbs, and the chair is just the right size. Anyone bigger, beware. I love the zero gravity option also. All in all, I give this chair a 4 out of 5....As long as it doesn't break!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Rock

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I believe the Relaxonchair is a good value. It arrived in a very timely manner. I was glad that I had another person to help me bring it in the house and set it up, although the set up was really quite easy. The chair has met all of my expectations and I use it at least once a day.
customer_reviews.author: Don Robison

customer_reviews.title: Great chair great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great chair,arrived ahead of schedule ,looks great. A little darker than the picture but I think it looks better , Mostly use the arms , foot rollers and the back roller from top to bottom awesome !! at the end of a hard day .
customer_reviews.author: 85/xv1000virago

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chair
customer_reviews.text: Excellent chair, extremely strong foot massage. Delivery guy (mike) from xpo was great. Got lucky and found this chair on a lighting deal for around 1500, after using it I'd say it was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: D M

customer_reviews.title: Meets all expectations except a couple small things...
customer_reviews.text: The reviews for this product were pretty spot on. Easy to set up and move, massage controlling is easy to understand but the two problems I run into are the shoulders pinch in too tight and the foot massage section can really put a squeeze on larger feet.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Berry

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was great, it arrived a day early
customer_reviews.text: This chair is fabulous !!! I was looking for affordable massage chair for awhile. Delivery was great, it arrived a day early. It is fully assembled. We had to attach a bolt and clip to foot massager. It was easy. I love the massage it gives. It's pretty intense especially in the arms and feet. Overall I love this chair!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra M Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fun but needs to be
customer_reviews.text: I'm love this chair my family and I are enjoying it alot . we would give it a 4 star on performance but. It missing minor things that make a product better. The chair should be able to be moved from one place to another. Mostly minor details should be needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Purchase and delivery as advertised. Easy set up. Easy move on wheels. Chair is excellent and very heavy. Foot massage a little too intense...we put some foam padding in there. Neck massage is a little week. Instructions were an interesting chinese to english translation that were understandable yet humorous. Overall an excellent product and a safe and reliable purchase and company. Great price and easily equal or better than the 5000.00 chairs that are advertised. KB
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This massage chair is very comfortable gives full body massage which I could fall asleep ...
customer_reviews.text: This massage chair is very comfortable gives full body massage which I could fall asleep easily during the massaging period and has assisted my insomina whom I have been suffering for many years. All my family members enjoy the 3D massage experience. We will definitely share this experience with people around and introduce this best product of 2016 from Relaxonchair. Thank you for the management for the immediate response on the delivery issue.
customer_reviews.author: H.Q.H

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can be a bit too intense and makes you hurt after using it the first couple times.
customer_reviews.author: DaFox

customer_reviews.title: look like i didn't use it
customer_reviews.text: i bought this chair on Nov 2. i try it but it is working too weak, look like i didn't use it. i had required for return, i hope i can return it, and find another better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chair I bought
customer_reviews.text: This chair is not nearly what I expected just threw away money do not buy this one please!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer: Bessie Magee

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: roller are to hard and it hurts my feet and this was not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This chair is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is heaven on earth! I purchased it for my husband as a gift but I use it almost every day after work. I really love the yoga stretching program. While the foot rollers can be intense, we put shoe inserts in the foot rest and that seems to help lessen the intensity. We have been using the chair daily for almost 3 months. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: KnowThyself

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally take time to write reviews but after having this Relaxon chair for two months I can say I finally have relief for muscle soreness and stress that has plagued me for years. Things to note: -Box won’t fit through standard 32” residential door frame. -This chair is not whisper quiet. Air bag valves make a small clicking/popping noise as they inflate/deflate -Air bag pressure can be painful if used on full intensity and you don’t have much meat on the bone -The seat is not built for large frames All in all I would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: John Larson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase. The delivery people were exceptional. The chair was easy to assemble and matches our sofa perfectly. We use the relaxinchair to relieve tension and sore achy lower back. The foot/ankle massage was a bit intense at first, so we put hand towels under the soles of both feet or keep on our shoes. The relaxonchair is like having a massage whenever you like.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this. I had it on max setting and could barely feel the massgae. Sending it back is a huge pain. I went with a Titan Osaka massage chair and it is so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: So far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. We need to buy a carpet based on their recommendation not to set it on a wood floor. The foot rest needs to be connected and the back pad zipped into place but that is about it for set-up. It is quiet and seem powerful. It uses 270 watts so that is pretty efficient for any motorized device. I can't feel any appreciable heat with my back but I can feel warmth with my hand when the heat is on. Overall, I would say this is a great addition to the rec room.
customer_reviews.author: J. Busse

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I have made. Don't go get a regular ho-hum massage. Get the real thing from this chair! Fabulous. The money saved on paying therapists will pay for this in no time. If you love a deep tissue massage this is where to get it. I can not say enough good things about it. My husband and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Eggenberger

customer_reviews.title: Product is good and great condition My lower star review was because ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is good and great condition My lower star review was because the instruction booklet wasn't written well. It doesn't adequately explain all the settings or what i can do to concentrate onone specific area. The instructions appear to have been written in a different language and then translated. Translations Might lead to misinterpretations or incomplete explanations. I wish i knew more about the different phases and how to make it do more. I have to play with the controls to figure it out. Also no information on warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: It was extremely easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I will do for reviews for this item in the next six months to follow up on the consistency of my rating. So far on day one I am loving this chair. It was extremely easy to assemble. It is heavy and large so we needed to remove the bedroom door from the hinge to fit it thru. The massage and intensity are amazing! I would have loved more cushion on the arms and the feet however for A chair costing less then $2000 it's got all the features of a $7000 chair. So far I'm extremely happy. This was a Christmas gift from my husband.
customer_reviews.author: MIT

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth The Investment
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to use. Feels amazing!! The four pre-programmed massages are the best! To personalize your massage, read the manual; within 30-40 minutes of reading and practice, you'll be a pro! I had to email customer service for a minor issue and they responded within 24 hours with a solution and a follow-up email. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer A. Hamm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hone therapy, excellent muscle massage, compression  and stretch.
customer_reviews.text: Despite the relatively modest cost compared to others, a superb massage chair. I’ve had mine a year and probably have used it 250-300 times. A former athlete with a few extra pounds I have very found three of the four programmed excellent and love me the variety. The deep shiatsu massage is remarkable. My only criticism is being 6’2 the head/neck section is a little cramped.
customer_reviews.author: M. SARTISKY

customer_reviews.title: Stress relief
customer_reviews.text: The machine is working a little bit hard on body despite of soft level. We put the towel or blanket on, and the problem is solved. When my husband is trouble of sleeping, he uses the machine and he falls sleep easily. Only one point down of it, is confusing to assemble the foot. Otherwise everything is great. We love it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: chappie love online shop

product_meta.title: RELAXONCHAIR [MK-II Plus] Full Body Zero Gravity Shiatsu Massage Chair with Built-in Heat and Air Massage System - Chocolate
feature_bullets: REDESIGNED & UPGRADED W/ ONE HAND OPERATION REMOTE CONTROLLER, GENTLE YET FIRM MASSAGE ROLLERS, REDUCED AIRBAG PRESSURE FOR ARM & CALF - 4 AUTOMATIC MASSAGE PROGRAMS - 3 MANUAL SPECIFIC TARGETED MASSAGES(KNEADING, TAPPING, COMBO) - 3 LEVELS OF AIRBAG INTENSITY CONTROL - 3 MASSAGE SPEED CONTROL

THREE STAGE ULTRA AUTOMATIC ZERO GRAVITY MULTI-FUNCTION MASSAGE CHAIR: Zero gravity chairs elevate your feet to the same level as your heart, minimizing the strain of gravity on your vertebrae, relieving the discomfort of back pain. Your heart can work less and you can relax more. QUALITY & INNOVATION: From top quality soft grained synthetic leather to enhance your experience to light total weight for easy mobility, the chair is thoughtfully designed with user friendliness in mind.

BUTTLOCK L-TRACKING MASSAGE SYSTEM: The rollers glide from the upper back all the way down under the seat. This new rolling system provides a full body massage. COMPUTERIZED BODY SCANNING: Built-in sensor automatically measure the length of spine and knows where to massage. AIRBAG MASSAGE TECHNOLOGY: Uniquely designed airbags are programmed to inflate/deflate separately which causes the body to twist and stretch on shoulders, lower back, hips, and thighs working simultaneously or individually.

DEEP TISSUE MASSAGE & FULL BODY STRETCHING: Designed to provide detailed, human-like massage throughout the body and the stretching function is also referred to as the “spinal decompression” program. With vigorous air cells pinning your body in place, the chair moves you to a calculated routine, and slowly stretches out the leg and back muscles. BEAUTY HIP MASSAGER: Multiple Air bag for your hip and your waist line which inflates for compression massage to align lower back and pelvis area.

LOWER BACK HEATING: 2 heating pads in lower back area that enhance the massage experience. ARM MASSAGER: Two air bags are carefully located to apply a deep massage to the forearms and wrists. CALF & FOOT MASSAGER: Multiple air bags on sides and back of the legs and feet which inflate for compression massage with bottom spinning roller that apply concentrated pin-point kneading massage. FULL SIZE REMOTE CONTROLLER: Large viewing screen to easily visualize what functions the chair has activated.
